article_title: Robert Kraig: Walker may be forced to do right thing on BadgerCare
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Scattered thunderstorms in the morning. Partly cloudy skies late. High around 85F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy with late night showers or thunderstorms. Low 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

article_metadata.description: When you look at the changing politics of health care and the nearly impossible budget hole Walker is digging for himself he may well have no choice but to take
article_metadata.author: ROBERT KRAIG | executive director, Citizen Action of Wisconsin
